name: Pages should use error handling page
Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' within a try catch block
Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block
Avoid using 'Throwable.printStackTrace()' within a try catch block
Avoid using 'Throwable.printStackTrace()' outside a try catch block
Avoid catching an exception of type Exception, RuntimeException, or Throwable
Avoid using CALL METHOD without error handling
Avoid using $http success and error function
Avoid the lack of error handling in the Node.js callbacks
